00127 // GP pairing search command
00128 typedef struct PACK
00129 {
00130   uint16_t appId                         : 3;
00131   uint16_t reqUnicastSinks               : 1;
00132   uint16_t reqDerivedGrpCastSinks        : 1;
00133   uint16_t reqCommissionedGrpCastSinks   : 1;
00134   uint16_t reqGpdSecurityFrameCounter    : 1;
00135   uint16_t reqGpdSecKey                  : 1;
00136   uint16_t reserved                      : 8;
00137 }ZGP_GpPairingSearchOptions_t;
00138 
00139 typedef struct PACK
00140 {
00141   ZGP_GpPairingSearchOptions_t options;
00142   ZGP_GpdId_t gpdId;
00143   uint8_t endpoint;
00144 } ZGP_GpPairingSearch_t;

00147 typedef struct PACK

00150   uint8_t alsoDerivedGroup              : 1;
00151   uint8_t alsoCommissionedGroup         : 1;
00152   uint8_t unidirectionalOnly            : 1;
00153   uint8_t reserved                      : 2;
00154 }zgpTunnelingOptions_t;

00174   uint8_t entriesCount;
00175   uint8_t tableEntries[ZCL_MAX_TX_ZSDU_SIZE];
00176   // length byte of proxy table entry + length byte for LW unicast list + Length byte for sink group list
00177 } ZGP_TableResp_t;

00232 // GP notification response command
00233 typedef struct PACK
00234 {
00235   uint8_t appId             : 3;
00236   uint8_t firstToForward    : 1;
00237   uint8_t noPairing         : 1;
00238   uint8_t reserved          : 3;

00240 
00241 typedef struct PACK
00242 {
00243   // 1 - Options, 4/8 - Src ID/IEEE addr, 1 - Endpoint, 4 - GPD secuiryt frame counter
00244   zgpGpNotifyRespOptions_t options;
00245   ZGP_GpdId_t gpdId;
00246   uint8_t endpoint;
00247   uint32_t gpdSecurityFrameCounter;
00248 } ZGP_GpNotificationResp_t;
00249 
00250 typedef struct
00251 {

00254   uint32_t removeGpd                : 1;
00255   uint32_t communicationMode        : 2;
00256   uint32_t gpdFixed                 : 1;
00257   uint32_t gpdMacSeqNumCapability   : 1;
00258   uint32_t securityLevel            : 2;
00259   uint32_t securityKeyType          : 3;
00260   uint32_t gpdSecurityFrameCounterPresent  : 1;
00261   uint32_t gpdSecurityKeyPresent       : 1;
00262   uint32_t assignedAliasPresent     : 1;
00263   uint32_t groupCastRadiusPresent  : 1;
00264   uint32_t reserved                 : 6;
00265   uint32_t reserved_padding         : 8;  
00266 }zgpGpPairingOptions_t;

00338 //GP pairing Configuration Options command
00339 typedef struct PACK
00340 {

00343   uint16_t seqNumCapabilities            :1;
00344   uint16_t rxOnCapability                :1;
00345   uint16_t fixedLocation                 :1;
00346   uint16_t assignedAlias                 :1;
00347   uint16_t securityUse                   :1;
00348   uint16_t applicationInfoPresent        :1;
00349   uint16_t reserved                      :5;
00350 }ZgpGpPairingConfigOptions_t;

00357   uint8_t gpdCommandspresent             :1;

00363 {

00367 
00368 //GP pairing Configuration
00369 typedef struct PACK
00370 {
00371   //ID of the GPD
00372   union
00373   {
00374     uint32_t srcId;
00375     uint8_t  srcExtAddress[8];
00376   } addrinfo;
00377 
00378   //The incoming security frame counter for the GPD
00379   uint32_t gpdSecurityFrameCounter;
00380   //The security key for the GPD
00381   uint8_t securityKey[SECURITY_KEY_SIZE];
00382 
00383   //The 16-bit GroupID and alias for the group communication.
00384   uint8_t *groupList;
00385   uint8_t *gpdCmdList;
00386   uint8_t *clusterlist;
00387   uint8_t *pairedEndpoints;
00388 
00389   ZgpGpPairingConfigOptions_t options;
00390   //The commissioned 16-bit ID to be used as alias for this GPD
00391   uint16_t gpdAssignedAlias;
00392 
00393   uint16_t manufacturerId;
00394   uint16_t modelId;
00395   ZgpGpPairingConfigActions_t actions;
00396 
00397   //GPD endpoint
00398   uint8_t endPoint;
00399   //To limit the range of the group-cast
00400   uint8_t groupCastRadius;
00401   //The security options
00402   zgpSecurityOptions_t securityOptions;
00403   uint8_t deviceId;
00404   //indicates the number of endpoints listed in the Paired endpoints field
00405   uint8_t noOfPairedEndPoints;
00406   ZgpGpAppInfo_t appInformation;
00407   uint8_t noOfGpdCmds;
00408 }ZGP_GpPairingConfig_t;
00409 
00410 // Attribute record in data point descriptor of application description command
00411 typedef struct PACK
00412 {
00413   uint16_t attrId;
00414   uint8_t attrDataType;
00415   uint8_t attrOptions;
00416   uint8_t attrOffsetWithinReport;
00417   uint8_t attrValue[ZGP_ATTRIBUTE_MAX_SIZE];
00418 }ZGP_AttributeRecord_t;
00419 
00420 // Data point descriptor of application description command
00421 typedef struct PACK
00422 {
00423   ZGP_AttributeRecord_t attrRecord[ZGP_MAX_ATTR_RECORD_IN_A_DATA_POINTER]; // array of attribute records
00424   void *nextDataPointDescriptor;
00425   uint16_t clusterId;
00426   uint16_t manufacturerId;
00427   uint8_t dataPointOptions;
00428   bool busy;
00429 }ZGP_DataPointDescriptor_t;
00430 
00431 // Report descriptor of application description command
00432 typedef struct PACK
00433 {
00434   ZGP_DataPointDescriptor_t *dataPointDescriptor;
00435   void *nextReportDescriptor;
00436   uint16_t timeoutPeriod;
00437   uint8_t reportId; // if it is free, then the value would be 0xFF
00438   uint8_t reportOptions;
00439   uint8_t noOfDatapointDescriptor;
00440 } ZGP_ReportDescriptor_t;
